page.content:
Ready-to-run OpenAMQ ********************
Download one of these packages:
- [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version)-linux.tar.gz:OpenAMQ server for Linux] - [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version)-solaris.tar.gz:OpenAMQ server for Solaris 10] - [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version)-win32.zip:OpenAMQ server for Windows]
Install and run in 5 minutes:
1. Unpack the compressed file. 2. Add the OpenAMQ /bin directory to your PATH. 3. To start the OpenAMQ broker, run 'amq_server'.
More information: [page:deploy]
Build OpenAMQ From Source - Linux, Solaris, Unix ************************************************
Build, install, and run in 20 minutes:
1. Download the [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version).tar.gz:Unix/Linux source package]. 2. Unpack the compressed file. 3. Type these shell commands:
$ cd OpenAMQ-$(main_version) $ set IBASE=$HOME/ibase; export IBASE $ set PATH=$IBASE/bin:$PATH; export PATH $ sh build.sh $ amq_server
More information: [page:build]
Build OpenAMQ From Source - Windows ***********************************
Build, install, and run in 20 minutes, requires MSVC:
1. Download the [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version).zip:Windows source package]. 2. Unpack the compressed file. 3. Open a DOS console and type these commands:
> cd \\path\\to\\OpenAMQ-$(main_version) > set IBASE=c:\\ibase > set PATH=%IBASE%\\bin;%PATH% > build > amq_server
More information: [page:build]
